name: EDOS Principles
intent: Define non-negotiable system-level invariants governing epistemic behavior.

principles.statement: No context, memory, or continuity may be used without explicit user action.
All intelligence must be pull-based. The system must never suggest, inject, or anticipate.
Any context used by the system must be visible, attributable, and reversible.
The system preserves structure, not posture. Personality emerges through interaction.
The system must never behave as if it remembers unless context is provided.
Any structural operation must be undoable without side effect.
